webdriver_test_tools.webdriver.actions.form_deprecated module¶

Wrapper functions for form module. Gives deprecation warning now that the actions module will not import * from forms in the future and to use actions.form.<function> instead

webdriver_test_tools.webdriver.actions.form_deprecated.fill_form_input(driver, form_element, name, value)[source]¶
webdriver_test_tools.webdriver.actions.form_deprecated.fill_form_inputs(driver, form_element, input_name_map)[source]¶
